home.name: Diyar
home.description: Building modern, multilingual, responsive web apps with React & Agile precision.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a Front End Developer and Agile Project Manager passionate about building fast, responsive, and beautifully designed digital experiences. My work blends clean code with thoughtful design, driven by a deep understanding of both user experience and project leadership.

myJourney.title: My Journey
myJourney.paragraph1: Pursuing a Bachelor's in English Language Teaching while building a career in web development and project management. Currently working toward PMP certification to strengthen my leadership in tech projects.
myJourney.paragraph2: I combine technical skills with strong communication to deliver results.

skill.title: My Skill
skill.description: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern web applications and managing successful projects.

servicesIntro: Comprehensive solutions for your digital projects and technical leadership needs.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building responsive and high-performance websites and web applications tailored to your business goals.

services.title: Web Project Management
services.description: Delivering projects efficiently through structured planning, tracking, and collaboration.

services.title: Design Integration
services.description: Seamlessly integrating beautiful designs into functional, production-ready front end code.

services.title: Agile Project Management
services.description: Applying Agile methodologies to foster flexibility, iteration, and rapid delivery.

services.title: UI/UX Optimization
services.description: Enhancing user experience through thoughtful interface design and interaction patterns.

services.title: Team & Client Communication
services.description: Ensuring smooth communication between team members and clients for successful outcomes.

1.title: DIYAR HAJI Restaurant
1.description: A comprehensive restaurant platform offering digital menus, table reservations, and online ordering to enhance customer experience and streamline restaurant operations.

2.title: Booking System Web
2.description: A real time booking system with calendar integration and payment processing, designed to streamline appointment scheduling and resource management.

3.title: Furniture E-Commerce Website
3.description: A modern e-commerce platform specializing in furniture sales with complete shopping cart functionality, secure payments, and order tracking.

4.title: Modern Restaurant Website
4.description: An elegant restaurant website featuring dynamic menu displays, online reservation system, and stunning gallery showcasing the dining experience.

5.title: Multilingual Portfolio Website
5.description: A sophisticated portfolio website with multi-language support, smooth animations, and SEO optimization to reach a global audience effectively.

6.title: CodeStan – Nike Ecommerce Store
6.description: A sleek e-commerce store inspired by Nike's design philosophy, featuring modern UI/UX with seamless product showcase and checkout experience.

7.title: Dining Redefined – Restaurant Website
7.description: A premium restaurant website that redefines the dining experience with modern storytelling, dynamic offers, and seamless reservation system.

8.title: Personal Portfolio Website – Diyar Haj
8.description: A professional portfolio website showcasing skills, services, and work with dynamic sections and smooth user experience to establish a strong online presence.

experience.description: A proven track record of delivering exceptional results in development and project management.

projectManager.title: Project Manager
responsibilities: Led 1+ web development projects using Agile methodologies
Coordinated developers/designers, managed sprints, retrospectives, standups
Reduced project delivery time by 15% with streamlined workflows
Maintained 100% on-time delivery and high stakeholder satisfaction

frontendDesigner.title: Front End Developer & UI/UX Designer
responsibilities: Developed 10+ responsive websites using React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
Redesigned UI in Figma, increasing conversion rates by 30%
Improved performance by 20% with lazy loading and code optimization
Ensured SEO best practices, accessibility, and mobile responsiveness

contect.title: Let's Connect
contect.description: Ready to bring your next project to life? Let's discuss how we can work together to create something amazing.
